benchmark_details.name: MLL Benchmark (Model Label Learning Benchmark)
benchmark_details.overview: The benchmark consists of 49 pre-trained Vision-Language Models (VLMs) and 17 target task datasets for evaluating VLM selection and reuse methods.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To facilitate evaluation of VLM selection and reuse methods across multiple tasks.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The current implementation focuses solely on VLMs and visual classification tasks.

data.source: 49 pre-trained VLMs, 17 target datasets including diverse domains and tasks.

methodology.calculation: Evaluation methodology based on zero-shot performance on target tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better selection and reuse methods for VLMs.
methodology.validation: Effects of using different counts of reused models were analysed.
